Name: Castle Break
About the game: Arkanoid \ Air Hockey with explosions, shooting and building Use your mouse like an air hockey striker to kick enemy bombs back into evil Black Castle! Destroy enemy towers with bombs, rockets and lasers, because they are evil. Don't forget to protect your little dudes - you need them to win. Features: ORIGINAL MIX OF arkanoid, air hockey physics, shooting and building Explosions, lasers, towerbugs - EVERYTHING YOU LIKE! Also, loud chanting. DEVELOP YOUR OWN TACTICS : Concentrate on kicking, shooting or building or everything - by choosing right upgrades! Protect your lesser brothers-in-arms ( AND don't expect they ever help you back) One-handed mouse-only controls lets you DRINK YOUR COFFEE and play in the same time. ... but try not to spill it, because some levels are really REALLY HARD! Beat 30-levels campaign and then the Endless mode BE WARNED: only for those who has endless time Global leaderboards - EVERYONE WILL KNOW HOW COOL YOU ARE
